title: I NEED A DUO Bronze 4 lol
body: I Was silver 4 for about 5 months. well as you can see I'm in bronze 4 now and I fucked up. need a duo who is Kinda good at a certain role and MATURE

replies.body:
Well just a word of warning about this guy. Played  match with him and I got judged after 1 performance and he completely flamed me to death.

If that's the kind of player you want to play with by all means add him. But his attitude is abysmal and no wonder he's now in B4 from silver.

Cheers,

Syn.

Hi mate I know how you feel, I have added you in-game and hope to hear from you soon!

I was up at bronze 1 when I came out of placements, got into a promo for silver and it all went downhill lol. Im pretty serious but I do like to banter during the game.

I also have skype or teamspeak so we can communicate.

Cheers,

Syn
